    I am a fourth-year Ph.D Candidate in Computer Science at Bellini College of AI, Cybersecurity and Computing, at University of South Florida. My research interests broadly lie in the area of applied cryptography, network security, and machine learning. My research seeks to improve the security of resource-constrained IoT devices through novel designs, formal security proofs, and full-fledged implementations.
